templates.name: Why did you change the shape of the bars?/ Why aren't they round?
templates.content:
We've updated our shampoo and conditioner bars to an 'S' and a 'C' shape, respectively, to make your shower experience even more effortless. We listened to feedback from our wonderful community and our newly designed bars are intentionally crafted for easy identification, effortless handling, and their ability to deliver thorough cleansing and nourishment to your hair.

The bars are made to fit comfortably in your hand and we hope these new shapes make it easier to identify the right bar, even when you're in a hurry! Additionally, the ridge technology used in these new shapes allows the bars to dry out faster post-use, potentially extending their lifespan.

Rest assured, the new shapes contain the same ingredients you've come to love. It's the same quality, just with a new look designed to enhance your daily routine. We deeply value your feedback and are always striving to improve.

templates.name: Is your jewelry waterproof?
templates.content: Water durability for our jewelry depends on which item you've purchased and what metal it's made out of. It won't immediately tarnish or turn green/black when it gets wet. Pewter, silver-plated, and stainless steel charms should be fine if briefly exposed to water, but in moderation. Just like anything else, too much exposure to anything will cause harm the item over time. Keep in mind, the pendants are a photograph of the moon, sealed with acrylic covering the photo which could be damaged if water somehow seeps in between the metal exterior of the pedant and the acrylic coating reaching the photo. This isn't very likely, but extended or excessive exposure to water increases this risk of damage. The water durability for chains also depends on their metal type; pewter isn't recommended to water exposure, sterling silver and rhodium coated chains should be fine if exposed to water, but again, in moderation and keeping them clean with appropriate cleaner is also suggested.

templates.name: How do I put a tab-style diaper on my loved one?
templates.content: There are a few ways to put a tab-style product on a loved one, and the easiest one tends to be while they're lying in bed. Start by rolling your loved one onto their side. Fold the product lengthwise (like a "hotdog"), and slide it between their legs, making sure the tabbed side stays in the back. Fan the backside out across their behind, then gently roll them back onto it. Afterward, pull the front panel up over their belly and fasten the tabs snugly. If the product is the right size, there will be no gaps around the leg holes, and the core will be resting snugly against the body (not hanging too low).

templates.name: Does the fact that the stove is smokeless make it environmentally friendly?
templates.content:
The ingenious design of our Solo Stoves makes it easier to 'leave no trace' and to reduce your environmental impact. The completely contained ash pan keeps your burn waste and hot coals off the ground. The clean smokeless burn that draws you to the flame is also responsible for reducing the amount of volatiles released into the air. 

You can create the most positive impact by being mindful of your fuel, always taking care to use low-moisture hardwoods or eco-friendly composite logs.

templates.name: Will your wallpaper work on my walls?
templates.content:
Surfaces with a texture can get you into some trouble with our peel and stick substrate. If you do have a slight texture to your walls, we'd recommend traditional wallpaper. 

Also, check to confirm that your walls are smooth and have a premium eggshell, satin or semi-gloss paint. Matte finishes can be a bit trickier, as the adhesive can bond and pull the paint. If you're applying fresh paint, remember that paint can take up to 4 weeks to fully cure - so keep that timeline in mind! Paint needs to be fully cured before installing wallpaper otherwise bubbling or peeling may occur.

templates.name: What is the best way to put on a bra?
templates.content: Wearing your bra properly is as important as finding the correct bra to wear. Place your arms through the straps and slide them over your shoulders. Then fasten the hooks to the middle position. Finally stand up straight and adjust your straps again, so your breasts are at the right level in the bra.

templates.name: Broken/bent needle
templates.content:
I'm sorry to hear that you have been having this issue with your needle! All Coravin purchases come with a 1-year needle warranty. If you could please provide me with the following information I can get this replacement process started. 

- The Serial Number of your Coravin, located on the underside of your device on the label next to the needle attachment
- The shipping address you would like your replacement delivered too
- Your phone number, for shipping purposes
- Receipt or location of purchase (if available)

There are usually 1 of 2 things that could have caused your needle to break. It could have been loose at the base, when you get your replacement please make sure it's tightly screwed in to the Coravin itself.  The other frequent cause of breakage is when you're pushing the needle in or pulling the needle out of the cork, please make sure to do so in one smooth downward or upwards motion, as any sideways tension could cause the needle to snap. Also please watch the bottom of the needle, if you notice any of the non-stick black coating of the needle wear off or become dull, it is time to replace it.

templates.name: Allergens
templates.content: Our ice cream-making machinery at The New Dairy is constructed of stainless steel. It's cleaned frequently and thoroughly throughout the production day to eliminate the possibility of pathogen transmission and allergen residue. For this reason, there's an exceptionally small risk of residue "carry over." If you're extremely sensitive to allergens, including gluten, wheat, soy, milk, and/or tree nuts, please note that all of our ice creams, sorbets, variegates and inclusions are produced and/or processed using the same equipment.

templates.name: May I give money to 4ocean to clean the ocean without receiving products in return?
templates.content:
Yes. Some members of the clean ocean movement want to pull pounds without purchasing products, which is why we created our Pound+ program. Think of it as purchasing our One Pound Promise as a service. Our professional, full-time cleanup crews pull your pounds from one of our global cleanup divisions.

This is not a tax-deductible donation - you will be receiving value in exchange for your purchase of the Pound+ service. We will issue you a digital certificate which you may share on social media to recruit others to the clean ocean movement. You can learn more about it here: https://www.4ocean.com/products/pound-plus

templates.name: How do I put a tab-style diaper on myself?
templates.content: To put a tab-style product on yourself, we recommend fastening the tabs to the front of the product before you put it on, creating the shape of underwear. Then, step into the product as you would traditional underwear. After the product is on, tighten the tabs until the product feels secure against your body. Some customers prefer to open the brief and place it on a chair (with the inside of the brief facing up), then sit onto it. Afterward, they pull the front panel up across the body and fasten the tabs. Choose whichever of these two methods makes you feel the most comfortable!

Our products do not contain latex, formaldehyde, flame retardants, nickel, carmine, red dye, copper, or zinc but we do make our bras in a shared facility that produces other brands. We appreciate your feedback!

templates.name: What’s the best care for a point-toe shoe?
templates.content: Our point-toe shoes, like all of our shoes, are made of authentic, very high-quality leather. Unlike synthetic materials, this leather will naturally show wear. In order to preserve your point toes, I suggest bringing them to your cobbler before their first wear. Everyone walks a bit differently, and your cobbler can help best protect your shoes from everyday wear. If you plan on walking in your point toes often, I suggest having a cobbler place rubber tabs on the toe tips.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.name: Can I wash my Adjustable Pillow?

Most orders will include a tracking number while some smaller orders won't. templates.name: How many calories are in a serving of Spa Girl Cocktails?

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: We design our products in-house at our corporate headquarters in New York City. To select our stateside and overseas partners, we prioritize quality, compliance with workers' safety, fair wages and benefits, and dedication to minimizing environmental impacts (things like water waste and air emissions). All factories we partner with are certified by the Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP) organization, a non-profit team of global social compliance experts that promote safe, lawful, humane, and ethical manufacturing. We partner with manufacturers globally, including East  Asia,  Southeast Asia, South Asia, and South America.

templates.name: Where is IGK Color made?
templates.content: IGK Color is made in Italy and professionally packaged right here in the USA. We concepted and designed IGK Color alongside master colorists in our professional salons to bring the shades to life.

If you want to add your reward to the bag at a later time, you can always access it in "Your Reward History".

templates.name: Kids Large Backpack size/ features

templates.name: Can the DreamCloud be folded for transport?
templates.content: DreamCloud is vacuum compressed with roller presses using over 10,000 lbs per square foot in the initial compression process. Because this is a process that can only be done with a machine, DreamCloud cannot be refolded once expanded in order to ensure the integrity of the mattress.

templates.name: How accurate are the weights of your products?

We crafted the Million Miles collection with a french terry blend. This

sweatshirt, making it suitable for activewear and all-day wear!

templates.name: What is the Pay Day Instant Repair Conditioner and how to use it?

It's a deeply nourishing conditioner, clinically proven to reduce breakage and 
support strength. Featuring clean bond-building, biomimetic and moisture-rich actives, this cleanser is the first essential solution to restored, healthier-looking hair. Apply it to wet hair, wait 3 minutes, and rinse.

templates.name: Why does my cleaning/soap solution bubble while it's dissolving?
templates.content: When our tablets are put into water, they create carbon dioxide (CO2), which are the bubbles that you see. Because our tablets bubble when they dissolve, there is no need for you to shake or stir.

templates.name: Will Total-T help with my athletic performance?
templates.content: While this is not an athletic performance product, when used along with resistance training, it can help you achieve increased gains in your strength training program. Clinical research shows an increase in athletic performance, as well as an increase in lower body strength, muscle size and lean muscle mass.

templates.name: Out of stock - VESSI CAD

templates.name: What size should I get? Size chart/when to size up/down
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! You can size down one size from your regular size for the women's Weekend shoes. For any of our other styles, if you're a half size, you can size up, so if you're 7.5, go for 8! Heres a link to our size chart - https://ca.vessi.com/pages/sizing and let me know if you need additional help  :)

templates.name: Can I run in these?
templates.content: Vessis are best used to be a leisure shoe. Light runs and jogs are okay but we wouldnt recommend any marathons or high intensity athletics :)

templates.name: How do I wash / clean my shoes?
templates.content: You can clean them easily using a water-based soap, and the one we recommend is Dr. Bronner's pure-castile soap. Simply run your shoes under warm water, then scrub them with a soft sponge. When you're done, rinse them off and let them dry in a well-ventilated areathey will be good as new :)

templates.name: Are the shoes able to repel any liquid?
templates.content: They're 100% liquid-proof, however, keep in mind that they're not stain-proof and will need to be cleaned to keep them looking fresh, but they're super easy to clean :)

templates.name: What is the material of the sole?
templates.content: The outsole is made from rubber, the midsole is compression EVA and the insole is made out of foam. :)

templates.name: What's the difference between all your styles?
templates.content: The Cityscape is our lightest sneaker with a minimalist design that transitions you from work to play. It is designed with a tapered and slim silhouette. Our Everyday sneaker is your everyday go-to. Its created with a chunkier midsole for additional lateral support and a higher laces cage for more footbridge support. Our Everyday Slip-on is easy to put on, and take off. We threw out the laces to get you out the door quicker. It's super lightweight, and great for packing into your carry-on! The Weekend has a slightly more relaxed fit compared to the other collections, it feels sturdy with less compression. They're all very breathable and comfy, you can't go wrong :)

templates.name: What is the weight and dimensions of the package my order will ship in?
templates.content: The weight of the box is around 1.7 lbs, while the dimensions are 33 cm x 22 cm x 13 cm.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at - 778-308-4263 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster :)

templates.name: Who do you ship with?
templates.content: We ship through Canada post.

templates.name: Are your laces waterproof?
templates.content: Unfortunately our laces are not waterproof, but rest assured this will not impact the shoes ability to keep your feet dry!

templates.name: Are they slip resistant?
templates.content: They're made with 4-way traction, providing the necessary slip-resistance you need for most activities. It would be incredibly hard to do the moonwalk in them, but take extra caution for icy or greasy surfaces :)

templates.name: Are you fairtrade certified?
templates.content: We manufacture in our own factories overseas which allows us to control every aspect of production including the work environment. While we dont have official documentation at this time, its something were actively working towards!

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: Please start your return here: https://ca.vessi.com/pages/return-or-exchange

templates.name: Are your shoes machine washable?
templates.content: Please don't use the washing machine on Cityscapes and Everyday's as this could damage the membrane and void the waterproofing feature. Your Weekend sneakers are machine washable though. Make sure to remove the insoles and laces first (these can be machine washed too, just on their own) and wash them in cold water under a gentle cycle. We recommend a mesh bag as well if you have it. Don't place them in the dryer as you can air dry overnight, away from direct heat.

templates.name: Are the socks waterproof?
templates.content: No, the socks are not waterproof :)

templates.name: Socks material
templates.content: Our socks are made from recycled TC Yarn 75%, 3075 spandex 20%, 100# elastic 5%.

templates.name: Socks sizing
templates.content: It depends on each person's preference but you can go with your normal sock size in other brands.

templates.name: How many times can exchanges be made?
templates.content: The same shoe can be exchanged twice before it's considered final sale. For example, if you get a blue shoe, you can exchange it for a green one, and then you exchange it for a red pair. That red pair is then considered final sale and can't be exchanged or returned.

templates.name: Are the insoles removable and can you use orthotics with the shoes?
templates.content: Yes, they are! Our insoles are removable to fit custom insoles and orthotics, allowing you to maximize comfort and support to your liking.

templates.name: Are your soles non marking?
templates.content: They're not NOT non-marking, but they're not made with that in mind so they might be :)

templates.name: Are they warm?
templates.content: They arent super-insulated as theyre engineered to be breathable, and while theyre ideal for cold climates, they are by no means a substitute for a super warm pair of winter boots designed to keep your feet warm for when it gets FRIGID out there :)

templates.name: Which style would be best for me? arch support
templates.content: It really varies based on what you'll be using them for, what you find comfortable, and what you like in terms of arch support, so it would really depend on your personal preference, however, the Weekend line has the most arch support while the other three are lighter weight in comparison. Hope this helps! :)

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: To cancel an order, please email us directly at support@vessi.com and in the subject line write : Cancel my order - order #

templates.name: The ankle opening is really tight/ Theyre hard to put on
templates.content: Its normal for the ankle opening to be quite firm at first in order to make sure no water will enter through the shoe opening. Its important for new pairs to be snug enough to adapt to your foot shape over time. The more you wear them, the more they will stretch to accommodate and create the perfect shape around your feet. Not to worry, after a few more wears the opening will have loosened up to become the perfect fit for you. We recommend a shoehorn in the meantime :)

templates.name: How do you clean the Weekenders?
templates.content: You can throw those in the washing machine and wash them on cold. Do not tumble dry, instead leave them to air dry. Wash on their own and not with other items, and keep in mind that white styles do require a little extra TLC to keep them in tip-top shape :)

templates.name: What's the weight of your shoes?
templates.content: They are 6.7 ounces, for a pair.

templates.name: Where are your shoes made and manufactured?
templates.content: Our shoes are made in Taiwan! :)

templates.name: Do you accept returns for gifts?
templates.content: Yes, we do! To return a gift, you can visit this link: https://returns.ca.vessi.com/#/gift

templates.name: Heel to toe drop
templates.content: Our heel to toe drop for the weekend is 2mm, for everyday's 3-4mm, for cityscape's 3-4mm and for slip on's 3-4mm.

templates.name: Will more limited editions come in? / When will you restock limited edition colors?
templates.content: Some of our color drops are limited edition runs which means that once theyre sold out theyre not likely coming back. That said, were always coming out with new shades, so keep an eye out for future drops! :)

templates.name: Location
templates.content: We're located in Chicago and Vancouver.

templates.name: Can I put a return in a box within a box?
templates.content: That won't work since the weight info on the pre paid label takes into account a bag and not a second box. Post office won't accept the package. You can place the shoe box in any plastic bag - even a few grocery store ones will do!

templates.name: Whats the grip like on the shoes?
templates.content: We added two-zone rubber herringbone tread design to increase frontal grip on the Everyday's, as well as side-to-side traction on wet surfaces. Our Cityscape's have a three-zone rubber tread designed for lightness and grip for both the city and light adventures. If you want the best grip, we recommend getting the Weekend sneakers! These are the strongest design of the bunch, made of full-length EVA rubber, making it the most slip resistant shoe! :)

templates.name: I have latex allergies. Are they ok for me?
templates.content: Oh no, sorry about that! If you have a latex allergy, our shoes may not be right for you since the midsoles are made out of EVA rubber, and the outsole is made of rubber. There is a chance that you would have similar reactions to the rubber material.

templates.name: How does the waterproof membrane work?
templates.content: They are 100% waterproof, sand proof, snow, and slush proof, as well as windproof - and its not a coating! Through research and hard work, we were able to develop a proprietary waterproofing technology called dyma-tex - a special knit made with millions of teeny, tiny holes in the membrane layer allowing for water in vapor form (sweat) and heat to pass through while keeping water molecules (which are too large to pass) from seeping into your shoes. This means the element-proofing will last the lifespan of your shoes!

templates.name: How long are your laces?
templates.content: They're 101.5cm! :)

templates.name: What is the material of the mask and how many layers is it?
templates.content: They're 100% cotton and consist of 2 layers, you add a 3rd layer if you insert a filter.

templates.name: Difference between men's and women's sizes/wide feet
templates.content: Our sneakers only come in regular width at this time, but they fit a lot like a sock :) They hug and stretch around your foot to adapt to your shape over time, so they still fit wider feet. Our styles are unisex, with mens sizes being slightly wider (1-2mm) with a bigger opening. If you're a female looking for a wider fit, picking a smaller size from the mens line may work better. Just be sure to go one size down from your women's size to find your perfect fit. For example, a wide women's 8 would be a men's 7!

templates.content: Our All Weather Hat is a non-refundable item right now.

templates.name: What is the shoe made of? / What materials does it use?
templates.content: It is made from Dyma-tex, our patented, 100% waterproof, breathable knit that will keep your feet cozy all year long - cool in the summer and warm in the winter. The outsole is made from rubber, the midsole is compression EVA and the insole is made out of foam.

templates.name: How do vessi's work with flat feet?
templates.content: Because Vessis are a casual/lifestyle shoe, there's not a lot of arch support. While some people find this works out perfect for their foot shape, others find it's not ideal for them. For the second group, we made the insoles removable so they can be swapped for any other kind that adapts to your preferences and needs.

templates.name: Can I use them for swimming?
templates.content: Our shoes are not meant to be fully submerged, so we advise against swimming with them. While they are 100% waterproof, this is only up to the ankle opening and water may still get inside if you submerge it in water.

templates.name: Are your shoes vegan?
templates.content: We're proud of the fact that all our sneakers are 100% vegan!

templates.name: How does your refer-a-friend program work?
templates.content: If you're referring a friend, you'll see your reward reflected in your account after they've placed their order with your code. You can stack as many rewards earned as you like when you're ready to use your savings. If you're using a code you received from a friend, keep in mind it's only applicable on first time orders over $100+ (before taxes and shipping). The referral code can not be combined with any other discount offers.

templates.name: Are your hats adjustable?
templates.content: Yes, they are! They have an adjustable closure at the back for a custom fit. :)

templates.name: How do I wash the hats?
templates.content: We recommend hand-washing our hats with a mild soap, and laying it flat to dry. Be sure not to use bleach on it, and definitely don't wash it in the washing machine!

templates.name: What countries do you ship to?
templates.content: Here's a full list of countries we currently ship to: Canada, United States, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, and Singapore. Our goal is to be able to offer Vessis across the world, so were working hard to bring the magic of Vessi to more locations worldwide!

templates.name: Can I use your shoes with/without socks?
templates.content: Up to you! Vessis are very breathable, so you can choose to go with or without socks. However, we do recommend wearing socks because they tend to help wick moisture and heat away from your feet, improving comfort and preventing early wear of the shoe. PS. Were big fans of no-show socks and even carry some Vessi ones designed with our shoe style in mind. :)

templates.name: Healthcare/medical worker discount

templates.content: We ship from our warehouses in Chicago (IL), Richmond (BC), or Hong Kong!

templates.name: What's the difference between the Everyday and the Everyday Move?

templates.name: How long do electric cars last?
templates.content: Because their powertrains are less complex than gasoline cars, there is less to go wrong with the major components in an electric car. Properly inspected and maintained, we'd expect an electric car to last just as long, if not longer, than any gasoline car - and most manufacturers offer eight- or even 10-year warranties on battery components.Over many years, the battery in an electric car can degrade slightly, losing some of its capacity over time. It is normal to experience a five percent loss of range per 100,000 miles of travel. You can reduce degradation by: limiting the time you use DC Fast Chargers; keeping your vehicle at a moderate temperature; and accelerating more gently.

templates.name: Can your products be used to treat cystic or nodular acne?

We suggest that you consult a dermatologist or physician to better determine what type of acne you have and identify the best treatment for you. templates.name: What preservative do you use?
templates.content: We use Optiphen Plus. It's a paraben - and formaldehyde-free preservative system that is ideal for products with a lower pH system. Optiphen Plus is an ISP patent-pending liquid preservative formulation featuring an innovative blend of phenoxyethanol, sorbic acid and an emollient base that is ideal for slightly acidic personal care products requiring broad-spectrum protection. The combination of all three ingredients offers effective protection against bacteria, yeast and mold growth while imparting emolliency.

templates.name: Will my dog be able to escape from this harness?
templates.content: These are great for dogs that tend to get out of their harness. You see, dogs are able to escape harnesses due to a lack of adjustability for the perfect fit. Even a slight discrepancy in how the harness fits may allow your fur baby to find a way to get out of it. We recommend a slightly snug fit (but not too tight) and your dog won't be able to back out or escape from it! Check out this review for information on how the harness works: https://joyrideharness.attn.tv/sl/kpFzOFFm

templates.name: Do I also need a box spring if I get a frame?
templates.content: Yes, the Foundation is designed to take the place of a box spring and provide support for the mattress. It can be used directly on the ground or on top of the bed frame. The bed frame can be added with the foundation but the bed frame cannot be used on its own with the mattress. It will not provide enough support. No matter which support system you choose, the base should be solid or have slats. If slatted, they should be no wider than 5 inches apart as that could cause sagging, potentially voiding your warranty. If you have an existing foundation that has support beams spaced more than 5 inches, you can use a bunkie board or a solid piece of plywood. Traditional box springs aren't recommended as they typically only have a few support beams with springs, encased in fabric.

templates.name: Nail art sticker application
templates.content: Prep your nails and/or apply the Lights Lacquer color of your choice. Wait for the polish to dry completely as the sticker will not stick correctly to the wet polish. Slightly flex the sheet and lift a corner of the sticker from the sheet using tweezers to gently peel away from the backing. Place onto the desired location and softly press down. To prevent nail art from smudging, place a small amount of topcoat over the sticker only and allow to fully dry, after the topcoat is dry apply to the full nail.

templates.name: Can I swim or workout after applying my tattoo?
templates.content: Inkbox tattoos are water resistant! Because our ink sinks into the top layer of the skin, it can withstand exposure to water and sweat. Please wait at least 8 hours post-application before working out, showering, or going for a swim. Swimming in chlorinated water will impact the longevity of your tattoo - so will extended exposure to water. To protect your tattoo when swimming, apply some balm (such as petroleum jelly) over the tattoo before hopping into the water.

templates.name: My LEVO C Basin Accidentally Overfilled
templates.content:
If you're having trouble with and your LĒVO C Basin was overfilled and liquid has seeped underneath, don't fret! LEVO C's heating mechanism and electronics are protected. Follow these steps to troubleshoot: 

1. Immediately power off and unplug the device. 
2. Once cooled, remove the basin. 
3. Use water-diluted vinegar to wipe away liquid from the inside the device and run the basin (plus stirrer) through a normal cleaning cycle in your dishwasher before putting back in place.

templates.name: What does a limited-slip differential (LSD) do?
templates.content: In its static state, a limited-slip is pre-loaded and provides traction to both wheels. When the LSD is further loaded, under acceleration, in a fast corner, or when wheel slippage occurs off-road the clutch packs limit wheelspin across the drive axle by permitting the axle shafts to spin at different speeds while continuously trying to balance the application of torque between the two axles. This results in transferring more power to the wheel with the best traction.

templates.name: What is the difference between IPL and Laser Hair Removal?
templates.content: The main difference between IPL and laser is the type of light used. IPL or intense pulsed light, is a broadband pulsed light, whereas laser is a single monochromatic light source. IPL and laser technologies both target the melanin in the hair follicle and you can expect permanent results from both. Energy, frequency and hair color are all determining factors in the efficacy of the treatment, while the light source, whether it is a laser or an intense pulsed flash light plays a minor role.

templates.name: How does Soltera differ from Pace 500?
templates.content:
here are some important differences between the Soltera and Pace 500 ebikes and I'd be happy to explain further. 

The Soltera is both for the commuter and casual city ebike rider. It comes in a single-speed version and a seven-speed. Soltera single-speed is our lightest ebike to date! So, if agility and weightlessness are a priority, this is an important feature to note. Soltera can reach a top speed of 20 MPH on both pedal assist and throttle and has a more aggressive riding stance, so you'll be leaning slightly more forward as opposed to being positioned upright. It also comes in more color variances if you'd like something more vibrant or subtle!

The Pace 500 is one of our other cruiser bikes, with a top-speed twist! Though it's a bit heavier than Soltera, it is designed to let you cruise fast. So, if a higher top speed is of utmost importance to you, the Pace 500 can reach top speeds of 28 MPH on pedal-assist. It's also our only ebike that comes with an adjustable stem, so you can adjust your handlebar up or down to your preferred position!

templates.name: What is the difference between HSA and FSA?
templates.content: Although FSAs and HSAs both allow you to use the pretax income for medical expenses, it doesn't mean these two programs are the same. There are plenty of things that separate them: qualifications, contribution limits, rollovers, and even withdrawal penalties, but the biggest difference is that you can control an HSA and allow contributions to roll over, while the FSAs are owned by the employer. In most cases, you can't have both HSA and FSA, so you have to choose.

templates.name: What does your Samples look like?

Our samples can look like a simple piece of printed paper. However, I can assure you it's much more than that! This product has been specifically developed for our on-demand production.

templates.name: Do you use synthetic fragrance or flavors?
templates.content: We never use synthetic fragrance or flavor due to the lack of regulation surrounding these ingredients. Under current policies, "fragrance" and "flavor" are considered trade secrets that can cover up anywhere from 10-30 additional toxic ingredients that don't have to be explicitly disclosed on the ingredient label. Whatever fragrance or flavoring we do use - usually an essential oil or extract - will be clearly labeled on our clean cosmetics ingredient list so you know exactly what you're getting.

templates.name: Sonicsmooth - Does dermaplaning cause razor burn or ingrown hair?
templates.content: The Sonicsmooth targets peach fuzz on the delicate skin on a woman's face, not the coarser hair found on the legs. Ingrown hairs and razor burn are not typical when dermaplaning. If this is something that you are prone to when shaving, the best recommendation we have is to make sure to use the prep cleanser and the soothe after gel. It's essential always to use a new Safety Edge each time. You may also want to try and small test patch to see how your skin reacts. However, most people do not encounter these issues when dermaplaning.

templates.name: What is the difference between polarized and photochromic?
templates.content: Polarized lenses are specially designed to filter out harmful glare caused by reflections from flat surfaces like water or snow. This enables them to enhance visual clarity and reduce eye strain, making them ideal for outdoor activities. On the other hand, photochromic lenses are equipped with technology that allows them to darken in response to the intensity of UV light. This adaptive feature makes them convenient for individuals transitioning between different lighting conditions, as they automatically adjust to provide optimal visibility. Both polarized and photochromic lenses offer significant advantages, but their mechanisms make them better suited for different situations.

templates.name: The neck on the wick tab is so long. Do you have wicks with a shorter neck on the tab?

This helps to prevent the candle from burning all the way to the bottom of the container and possibly breaking the glass, which can be a fire hazard.

templates.name: Are there different types of hyperhidrosis?
templates.content: There are two forms of hyperhidrosis, known as secondary hyperhidrosis and primary hyperhidrosis. Primary hyperhidrosis is the most common form of hyperhidrosis, affecting approximately 15 to 20 million people in the United States alone. Secondary hyperhidrosis, although less common, is often indicative of another medical problem and is an issue for older individuals.

templates.name: How do I clean my 14k gold jewelry?
templates.content: Mix a few drops of detergent-free soap with warm water. One piece at a time, soak your jewelry and then use a very soft brush to lightly clean each piece. Rinse with care and finally, lightly dry the jewelry with a lint-free cloth or paper towel. Always store your 14k in a dry area, like your Aurate travel pouch, to prevent exposure to the elements. Don't keep it stored for too long though - it was made to be worn!

templates.name: What is the Clean Carbs - Sweet Potato Powder?
templates.content:
Clean Carbs is an all-natural carbohydrate supplement providing the nutrition of
one. It's made from organic sweet potatoes, stevia, and vanilla powder via cold processing so all nutrients are intact.

Most carbohydrate supplement powders are so quickly digested that they spike insulin levels and can lead to gastrointestinal distress and gut dysbiosis. The carbohydrates are entirely from sweet potatoes in Clean Carbs and processed in a way which leaves the plant walls in place. You might notice a little grittiness with the product, but that is totally intentional. This way the carbohydrates are digested further down the digestive tract, preventing insulin spiking and providing food for all of the beneficial gut microbes in your large intestine.

templates.name: Can Revaree help tighten the vagina?
templates.content:
Revaree is not designed to tighten vaginal tissues. It is designed to treat vaginal atrophy and associated symptoms of dryness, burning, irritation, and painful sex. 
 
The key ingredient in this product is hyaluronic acid, an already naturally occurring molecule in the body that can retain 1000x its weight in moisture. It is also part of the body's extracellular matrix responsible for hydration and tissue repair. When applied vaginally, hyaluronic acid has been shown to repair vaginal elasticity and softness. 
 
To learn more about this ingredient you can check out our blog post here: https://hellobonafide.com/blogs/news/hyaluronic-acid-is-a-naturally-powerful-remedy-for-vaginal-dryness-heres-how-it-works

templates.name: What's the difference between an adult diaper and pull-up?
templates.content: There are a few key differences between adult diapers and pull-ups. Pull-ups look like regular underwear, and are worn in the same way, while tab-style adult diapers open up at the sides and fasten in the front. Pull-ups are ideal for mobile, relatively active adults with mild to heavy urinary incontinence, while tab-style briefs, are ideal for those caring for others or who are immobile and are best suited for heavy incontinence, including bowel incontinence. And finally, tab-style briefs are more absorbent than pull-ups.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my wood furniture?
templates.content:
To maintain the quality of your wood furniture, do not expose it to direct sunlight or extreme temperatures. Dust often using a soft, clean, lint-free cloth that has been only slightly dampened, and attend to spills immediately with a damp cloth. Use table runners, place mats, table pads, and coasters to reduce the chances of marking or damaging the wood. Avoid the use of dyes, paints, inks, bleach, nail polish, and similar products on and around your wood furniture.

Surfaces can be cleaned with a mild non-alkaline soap and water. Use the suds on a damp sponge or cloth, but be sure to test the solution on an inconspicuous section to make sure it doesn't damage the finish. Dry immediately with a soft cloth and buff lightly, following the grain.

templates.name: What’s the mattress made of?
templates.content: Unlike foam and latex, our mattresses are completely safe, non-toxic, hypoallergenic, and breathable. Our mattresses consist of 3 components: the Wovenaire unique core material made of 90% air and 10% food-grade polymer (that's the stuff yogurt containers are made from), the 3-dimensional Breathe-Thru cover that is 100% polyester, and an encasement made of viscose (a reconstituted wood pulp) that is used as a natural fire barrier. Our Waterproof Mattress and Waterproof Crib Mattress Pad have a TPU lining that is a heat-sealed fabric waterproof lining. Additionally, all of our mattresses are Greenguard Gold certified, showing our products are safe and non-toxic and will help improve indoor air quality.

They focus on identifying out of the range markets contributing to acne and provide a tailored plan of action to address each concern.

templates.name: Can I still take a product if it's expired? Will it become toxic? How long can I continue to take it beyond the best used date?
templates.content: Products won't become toxic, but they'll gradually lose potency beyond the best used by date. Probiotics, fatty acids and liquids should be used as soon as possible after the best used date since they're more vulnerable to loss of potency. Most supplements in pill or powder form can be used for another year past the best by date. Minerals, which are very stable, could even be used for two years past the best by date. We don't have research documentation on the rate of potency loss beyond the best by date.

templates.name: Pet Safe / Child Safe / Ingesting
templates.content:
We have an article all about pet-safe succulents that you can read here:
https://mountaincrestgardens.com/blog/pets-and-your-succulents-what-you-should-know/ We also have a pet-safe filter on the left side of the website when browsing any of our categories. If you're concerned about kids, I would avoid Euphorbias, Kalanchoes, or Sansevieria to be on the safe side. Also, consider avoiding any varieties that have easily breakable candy-sized leaves like 'Jelly Bean'.
To be on the safe side, I'd recommend calling poison control if your child ingests any succulent. It likely won't cause any serious harm, but it could make them sick.

templates.name: What is the thread count for your linen bedding?
templates.content:
From our point of view, the source of the linen (France) is the most important
measurement of quality. French linen is superior not only for quality but because of the visibility you have in the sourcing. It's the only linen that you can certify the source and we pay up for that certification. Our linen sheets are about 100 thread count. When it comes to linen bedding, thread count isn't very relevant because the regular linen yarn is already thicker than cotton yarn, so you don't need as many threads as cotton to make your sheets softer. Linen sheets are given a rating based on their grams per square meter (GSM). Our sheets have a GSM of 160, meaning they are lightweight and airy. Our sheets are garment-dyed and stonewashed, so they're incredibly soft. Each piece is Oeko-Tex® certified and made sustainably in a fair-trade working environment.

templates.name: What is your Aurora Light Shaping material?
templates.content: The Aurora Light Shaping is the next evolution of our signature circular knitting technology, centered on the Cradle to Cradle approach - a design concept based on the principles of the circular economy, in which the product is an intrinsic part of the ecosystem and can be returned to the biological cycle. It's a revolutionary operating model anchored by five pillars: material health, social fairness, material reutilization, renewable energy, and water stewardship. Wolford is the first fashion company honored with the Cradle to Cradle CertificationTM at the gold level for the biological and technical production cycles. The material is made using just three components - TencelTM Modal, Vinatur®, and RoicaTM - all responsibly sourced and 100% recyclable to ensure it can be fully reused to develop new products.

templates.name: What are the differences between the Essential Series and the Signature Series Shears?
templates.content:
The Signature Series Shears are the original, upper tier line with advanced ergonomic comfort and superior performance. These high-performance precision shears are made with Japanese molybdenum alloy, Rockwell Hardness/60-61. They have convex blades and a polymer lining at the pivot point for an even smooth gliding action. They also have a Leaf Spring Tension System, so the blades evenly distribute cutting action across the length and width of the blade.

The Essential Series Shears are the humble, yet powerful brother of the Signature Series Shears, made with 440C Japanese Stainless Steel, Rockwell Hardness/58-59, they have convex blades and a Click Set Stream Line Tension System with a flat screw, which is ideal for slide cutting.

templates.content: An IE error code indicates that the washer was unable to fill with water. templates.name: Can Ristela increase your heart rate?
templates.content:
Ristela is a supplement that typically focuses on supporting hormone balance, especially for women in perimenopause or menopause. It generally doesn't directly affect the heart rate in most individuals. However, it can have different effects depending on your body's response to the ingredients, and some people may experience mild side effects such as changes in mood, energy levels, or heart rate.

If you notice a significant increase in your heart rate or feel unusual symptoms after taking Ristela, it would be a good idea to stop using it and consult with a healthcare professional. It's important to ensure that there are no underlying health concerns or interactions with other medications you might be taking.

templates.name: What is the difference between permanent color, demi-permanent color, semi-permanent color, and temporary color?
templates.content:
While they sound a lot alike, there's a distinct difference between each kind of hair color. Temporary color is exactly as it sounds: temporary. The color sits on top of the hair cuticle and is washed away with water or shampoo. Think sprays, hair chalk etc. Semi-Permanent color is developed with a single product, so you don't need to mix it with an oxidizer. The color is applied directly to the hair and then processed for 20 - 30 minutes, sometimes using heat. The results gradually fade over time and will generally last for 7 - 10 shampoos. 

Demi-permanent color is a 2-part system that uses a dye pigment mixed with a low volume oxidizer. The low volume oxidizer limits the amount of color change, so the results are long-lasting but not necessarily permanent. Permanent color is, well, just that. It's a 2-part system that uses a dye pigment and oxidizer, which is usually a solution of hydrogen peroxide. When the two parts combine, the mixture both removes some of the hair's natural pigment molecules and deposits the desired color molecules which changes the color of the hair permanently.

templates.name: Is Revaree Plus and Ristela safe to use with a history of uterine cancer?

Our Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Alyssa Dweck does recommend Revaree (the original formula) to her patients in similar situations and has provided us a blog on this topic, here: https://bonafide.attn.tv/ad3TP_cUikSL.

We still would recommend checking in with your healthcare provider first, just as a precaution and as they know your medical history best. We apologize for any inconvenience.

templates.name: Do I wear the same size bra in each style?
templates.content:
We size all our bras with the same sizing standards. You should wear the same size in all 4 styles. However, some women prefer a different fit for each style. The Flex Sports Bra has a V-neckline and the Ultimate Sports Bra has a U-neckline. This can result in less coverage in the Flex than the Ultimate. 

Some women who are on the edge of sizing will choose to go up a size in the Flex Sports Bra. 

Our Low Impact Sports Bra, Lounge Bra, and Boss Longline Bra. are made of a
seamless material that fits snug when you first put it on, some women prefer to
size up in these styles, and some enjoy the compression of their same size.   

For additional cup space in the Ultimate Sports Bra, Low Impact
Sports Bra and the Lounge Bra, try removing the breast cup inserts before you
go up a whole size.

templates.name: How do you attach a name plate to a horse halter?
templates.content: First, unwrap your name plate and center it on the halter it will be attached to. Mark where the holes will be and then use a hole punch to punch holes where you marked. Push the rivets from the back through the holes in the tack and then through the nameplate. Finally, hammer the rivet caps onto the tops of the rivets to stabilize the halter nameplate.

templates.name: Where are Rhone products made/manufactured?
templates.content: Our primary goal in designing and manufacturing a Rhone product is that it delivers best-in-class performance at its price point and excels on the dimensions of quality, comfort, and fit.  We search all over the globe for the best textile mills and factory partners who not only meet our production requirements, but also meet our labor, ethical, environmental, and other requirements. Today, our largest factory partners are located in China, Peru, Portugal, Turkey, and Vietnam, among other countries. We routinely visit and inspect the locations of our factory partners to ensure compliance with our standards. With any concern to COVID-19, each of these locations is taking precautions to any concern to regulations. Our receiving warehouses are taking proper CDC measurements to ensure the safety and well-being of arriving products. While our products change throughout the year, it is complicated to provide a list of what products are made in specific regions. Almost all Rhone garments are designed by our team in the United States.

templates.name: What NIJ level is best for me?
templates.content: In addition to possible department regulations, some factors to consider regarding NIJ Level include: Select armor designed to defeat ammunition used in your own firearm or in weapons known to be used in the area you patrol; know if your armor will be used as part of an Active Shooter Kit or worn for extended periods; know what firearms are used by your workforce; be aware of sport shooting or hunting in your area.

templates.content: Liver Reset is a combined blend of clinically studied ingredients that use modern science and Ayurvedic intelligence to deliver a potent blend that supports the liver. We're constantly surrounded by various toxins that tax our liver. Non-organic food and beverages, household products, medications, environmental toxins from outdoor & indoor pollution, alcohol and even tap water are just a few of the many toxins we're exposed to on a daily basis. The liver is responsible for numerous functions in the body such as aiding in digestion, supporting the immune system, storing vitamins and minerals, regulating energy and detoxifying the body. It's important to support the liver daily and even more so if you have recently been off track with your normal eating habits, consuming alcohol or find yourself in an environment that is heavily polluted.

This is perfectly normal, and as long as the product is cool to the touch simply store it in the freezer. When shipped alone, dry goods may be sent in a corrugated box.

templates.name: Is your Witch Hazel just a water and Witch Hazel extract? How is it extracted?
templates.content:
The Witch hazel extract is a clear liquid distilled from the twigs and bark of the witch hazel tree (Hamamelis virginiana), and the certified organic witch hazel extract we offer is collected and distilled domestically.

Witch Hazel Distillate, sometimes also called "Witch Hazel Distillate Water" and "Witch Hazel Extract," is extracted from the bark and leaves of the Hamamelis virginiana botanical, better known as the Witch Hazel shrub.

templates.name: What is the UE CSX
templates.content: UE FITS are designed for any consumer whose top priorities when purchasing true wireless earbuds are a secure fit and comfort, and an instant custom-fit. UE CSX earphones are a handcrafted, bespoke product designed for the audiophile as it incorporates up to 8 premium balanced armature drivers and is priced from $499 and above. The CSX series also uses a different method to capture an impression of your ear, are hand made, and will take around 3-4 weeks to be built. The CSX earphones are best suited for those who demand the absolute best in sound quality and design, whereas UE FITS are more accessible and offer an instant fit.

- Certain items such as accessories, socks, underwear, ties, and items included as a bonus are not exchangeable

templates.name: Difference between the Rotary Cutters
templates.content:
Great question! So the 28mm size is ideal for precision on small cutting jobs - it can cut into inside corners on intricate appliques with better control than a larger blade, and is also ideal for cutting clothing pattern pieces with curved lines like armscyes and notches. 

For the 45mm size, choose that when you have small straight cuts to do, like cutting on the line for half square triangles. It's also the one to choose if you only have one rotary cutter as it does most cutting jobs well. As for the largest 60mm size, it's great for those who have larger hands, and is good for cutting up to six layers of quilting cotton or for long straight cuts like the width of fabric folded.

templates.name: How frequently should I cleanse or wash my face?
templates.content:
We recommend cleansing your face once in the morning and once before bedtime. It is also great to use after a workout or after spending time outdoors. After cleansing, follow up with your favorite moisturizer to hydrate your skin.

Use a gentle cleanser formulated for daily use such as our Charcoal Face Wash Daily Detox! It's formulated with charcoal to help gently remove sweat, dirt, and oil buildup. In addition to cleansing, its shea butter and Centella Asiatica ingredients also help balance and nourish the skin. Hope that helps!

templates.name: How do I clean/wash  textile or canvas shoes?
templates.content: We recommend using a damp cloth and rubbing gently with lukewarm water and mild soap. We don't recommend machine washing your shoes as it may compromise the integrity of the product. We also don't recommend applying direct heat to your shoes or placing non-waterproof footwear under running water. When attempting to clean them, we always recommend testing the cleaning process in an inconspicuous area first to ensure there is no discoloration. Once cleaned, we recommend air drying them in a cool, dry environment-away from direct sunlight. Gently stuffing the shoes with paper can help maintain the shape as they dry.

templates.name: How are Nutrafol hair growth formulas different from Biotin and other hair vitamins, minerals, and collagen supplements?
templates.content:
Recent research reveals that hair thinning is due to many factors: elevated cortisol, male and female hormones (DHT, estrogen, progesterone), oxidative damage (styling), immune-signaling dysregulation, environmental toxins, and even aging. While Collagen and vitamins and minerals such as Biotin and Zinc are important for maintaining healthy hair, they don't get to the root of the issue.

That's why we take a whole-body approach to hair growth. Our Nutraceuticals make addressing key hair thinning triggers as simple as possible-with one daily dose of powerful natural ingredients that have been clinically tested for efficacy in hair growth and overall wellness.

templates.name: I am an athlete. Will training with a Helix improve my sports performance?
templates.content: Absolutely, which is why many professional sports teams (like The New England Patriots, the Cleveland Cavaliers and the LA Lakers) use our lateral trainers as part of their training protocol. Lateral or side to side movement is crucial to most sports, including ice hockey, tennis, golf, skiing, football, squash, and soccer. templates.name: What if my shipment is international?
templates.content:
We ask for 2-3 business days to process your order before shipment. We do not ship on Saturday, Sunday, or on Holidays.

Cozy Earth provides worldwide shipping to our customers outside of the US, and pricing varies country to country.

We offer FedEx International Shipping for our international customers. We do not make money on charging you for shipping. We are very conservative in our shipping charge costs, and in many cases, we undercharge what the actual cost is to ship the product(s). Shipping is not our product.

Due to International customs fees, import taxes and shipping costs - we are not able to offer a "Free Shipping" option for our international customers.

Our international shipping rates are calculated based on the total weight of your order.

All packages shipped via FedEX International generally arrive within 5-14 business days. However, delays created by customs may require a 10-20 business-day time in transit. This is very rare, but do be aware of this possibility.

If you are experiencing complications for your delivery, please contact the shipping carrier. For most cases, Cozy Earth is unable to provide any additional information or changes to your shipment once it has left our facilities.

Cozy Earth is not liable for any lost packages due to address errors.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Pace 350.2)?
templates.content:
Pace 350.2 can and will withstand biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it is an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Pace 350.2 is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is a standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Pace 350.2 in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Pace 350.2 tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snowfall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: Should I shave? How long should I wait to apply after shaving?
templates.content:
If you have coarse or dense hair, we recommend shaving prior to application. This is because hair acts as a barrier between the ink and skin (so the tattoo won't adhere directly!). This can cause the ink to leak, smudge, or for the tattoo to be underdeveloped.

Light hair on the application area is fine and allows for a good transfer, but the more hair there is, the more room there is for error. If you are questioning whether or not to shave the application area, we suggest shaving it.

templates.name: How can I maintain and clean my jewelry?
templates.content:
To keep your jewelry dust and dirt free, and to prevent unwanted oxidation or tarnishing, store your pieces in a jewelry box with the lid closed, or in a ziploc bag. Wrapping your jewelry in a soft cloth will also keep it clean and prevent it from oxidizing. Wrapping your pieces individually will prevent scratching. 

Oxidation is a natural process that turns metal darker in color. High humidity and individual chemistry are factors in this process. Always apply hairspray, perfume and cosmetics before putting jewelry on. Mild cleaners and polishing cloths can be used to brighten and restore jewelry.

templates.name: What's the difference between USV100 original and USV100 premier?
templates.content:
That's a great question! The difference between the UVS100 Original and the UVS100 Premier Series Custom Sunscreens is mainly in the appearance and included accessories, not performance.

Both are custom-fit to your vehicle's windshield and built with the same core materials: a reflective outer layer, a foam core for insulation, and a soft felt backing. Both provide excellent heat and UV protection and help keep your interior cooler.

The Premier Series, however, adds a more upscale look. It features a black backing and black binding around the edges, while the Original has a lighter gray color. The Premier also comes in premium finishes like Chrome Camouflage, Galaxy Silver, and white, which give it a more stylish appearance.

In short, both perform the same in terms of sun and heat protection, but the Premier Series offers a more refined design and added accessories. If aesthetics and presentation matter to you, the Premier is the better option. If you're focused strictly on function, the Original will serve you just as well. Hope this helps!

templates.name: How to apply the 3-in-1 eye cream
templates.content: With Total Eye, dispensing and applying the appropriate amount is very important. Be sure to dispense half a pump to the applicator tip and dot around both eyes. This half pump is enough to cover the entire orbital region (under eye to brow-including eyelids) for both eyes. This means ¼ pump per eye. If you apply more, the extra product can collect in fine lines or settle in under-eye creases, and if you're just using it for under the eye as opposed to the entire eye area, this might require less product. Once the appropriate amount is applied, use the applicator tip to smooth the product over and then use your fingertips to blend - this will allow for a nice finish.

templates.name: Self rescue on a closed cockpit kayak
templates.content: Safety is always first and we're glad to know you are looking to be prepared. There are several self-rescue techniques that you can try. We recommend practicing them in controlled environments and using the right gear such as float bags, dry bags for your gear and a PFD for yourself. The Float bags help by displacing water that would otherwise fill a compromised kayak, float bags make recovering a capsized kayak a lot simpler. Water is heavy and it is much harder to try to flip a kayak filled with water and the Oru can easily get bent out of shape in that situation. Float bags for a kayak are similar to a PFD for you. You can also watch this video on saftey and self rescue: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khUx-Kx3_0I&list=PL08ykIUY3NqePE7mTtLlVZSenkqDmTOE2&index=20

templates.name: What does the Hello Test do?
templates.content:
The Hello Test is a very basic data connection test. It detects if the Spartan GoCam is connected to the carrier's data network. With the camera in Setup mode and connected to the cellular network (the carrier name and signal strength bars appear at the top of the screen), press Menu, Wireless (last tab), scroll down to Diagnostic and then press Hello Test. 

If the camera screen shows Successful!, your camera is connected to the cellular network. If it says Failed, it is not. You'll need to be sure that you have an active data plan and are using a "to spec" SD card.

templates.name: Do your products help with alopecia?

templates.name: How often does an electric car need to be serviced?
templates.content: While gasoline cars have dozens of mechanical components that require service or repair, electric cars are much simpler. You won't need to do tune-ups, oil changes, or change spark plugs, drive belts, or service transmissions.But, electric cars are still cars. They will still need service because they contain many hard-working components that make them stop, go, and turn. Tires, brakes, and suspensions are subject to wear and tear and should be regularly inspected according to the manufacturer's recommendations, usually once a year.

templates.name: What is 5-Ply Stainless Cookware?
templates.content:
Premium stainless clad cookware is made by bonding 5 layers of metal together to capture the best qualities of each.

In the "premium" market you have things like tri-ply, 5-ply, copper core, etc. The external layer of our cookware on the cooking side is 304, 18/10 stainless steel. The 18/10 stainless steel resists corrosion and rust and won't react with your food. The external layer of our cookware on the element-facing side is made from a high-grade ferritic 430 stainless steel, so it is both durable and magnetic (to work with induction cooktops). Stainless steel provides durability, induction compatibility, and a non-reactive surface.

The middle three layers are alternating layers of pure aluminum and aluminum alloy, which is a combination of metals known for their heat conductivity and responsiveness.

templates.name: Where and how is the gift message printed?
templates.content: The gift message will be printed on the packing slip, which is sent in the package with the book to the recipient. This message should be no longer than 175 characters. The message will be "word wrapped" by the computer so do not type the "enter" key to separate lines. When the enter key is pressed, your message will include a "/" character. Thus, please type a message such as: "Dear Mike, I hope you will always treasure this book and think of Uncle John and me when you read it. Love, Aunt Mary".

templates.name: My wick smokes when it's closer to the bottom of the vessel, is that safe?

templates.name: I am a senior. Is Helix safe for me?
templates.content: Our lateral trainers are an excellent choice for seniors for many reasons. First, they've been shown to dramatically and quickly improve balance by strengthening the side muscles of the body and correcting common strength imbalances that can contribute to fall risk. Second, they're non-impact, so they're safe for hips and knee joints, even for many who suffer from joint pain or arthritis. Finally, they enable older exercisers to work on their cardiovascular system while they safely build muscle strength. For older or deconditioned users, or those with existing balance issues, we recommend our recumbent models.

templates.name: Do you deliver to hospitals, hotels, and universities?
templates.content:
When delivering a perishable package to hospitals and universities, it is best to contact the mail room for their rules, regulations and operating hours for receiving packages. FedEx typically delivers to the mailroom or receiving department at these locations. It is then the responsibility of this department to deliver the package to the correct recipient. This may cause delays as the mailroom or receiving department does not guarantee delivery within a given period.  Most mailrooms are only open Monday-Friday.  

If shipping to a hotel, we recommend informing the front desk / concierge that you are expecting a perishable package and request they refrigerate your board for you until you arrive.

templates.name: Can I use True Lemon in place of fresh lemon or bottled lemon juice?
templates.content:
True Lemon is a great alternative to fresh lemon juice or bottled lemon juice and can be used for cooking, baking, and seasoning. In the vast majority of recipes, where you want just the lemon taste - you can add True Lemon directly into the other ingredients. (Generally, we recommend 2 to 3 sachets = 1 tablespoon lemon juice.) However, in some recipes, it may be necessary or desirable to add an equivalent amount of water to replace the moisture the lemon, lime, orange, or grapefruit juice provides. In these cases, add both the appropriate number of True Lemon, True Lime, True Orange, or True Grapefruit packets and the necessary amount of water. 

You can find the measuring equivalents and conversions here: https://www.truelemon.com/pages/measuring-equivalents

templates.name: Mini Guitar Kit - Which strings should I use?
templates.content:
For the Mini Guitar Kits, you can use a standard guitar string set starting at .009" or .010" gauge if you tune A to A, similar to having a capo at the 5th fret of a standard-scale guitar. 

If you want to tune a full octave up to get back to E to E tuning, you can use a .009" set but will need to replace the high-E string with a .007" gauge string. Otherwise, it may break from the added tension. You could also use a set starting with .007", such as our item #1346 Dunlop Reverend Willy's Electric Guitar Strings: https://www.stewmac.com/strings-and-accessories/strings/electric-guitar-strings/dunlop-reverend-willys-electric-guitar-strings/

templates.name: Are your steaks rated prime?
templates.content: We often get asked about USDA grading and while nearly all of the beef we source is USDA Choice and USDA Prime, these grades are only one small factor in our beef selection. Omaha Steaks and the Simon family have been grading and selecting beef using proprietary processes since 1917, decades before the Agricultural Marketing Service of the USDA became responsible for beef grading in 1939. We are America's Original Butcher. No one has been "grading" steak longer than Omaha Steaks and no one knows beef better than we do. The USDA grade of beef depends on really just one factor: marbling. So, if you are looking for a basic grade on our steak, you won't find it because we consider at least 5 different variables (of which, marbling is one) when determining if an Omaha Steak is to become a Gourmet, Butcher's Cut, or a Private Reserve steak.

templates.name: What is EWG?
templates.content:
The Environmental Working Group is a non-profit, non-partisan organization with a mission to empower people to live healthier lives in a healthier environment. Since 1992, the Environmental Working Group has shined a spotlight on outdated legislation, harmful agricultural practices and industry loopholes that pose a risk to our health and the health of our environment. EWG's team of scientists, policy experts, lawyers and communications and data experts work tirelessly to reform our nation's broken chemical safety and agricultural laws. 

We are proud to say that all of our fragrances are EWG Verified™, a mark that stands for health, transparency, and good manufacturing practices.

For more information on EWG and their Skin Deep Database, please visit https://www.ewg.org/skindeep/.

templates.name: How do I prevent sticking in my Carbon Steel?
templates.content: It's completely normal for food to stick to a new carbon steel pan before it develops a seasoning. Developing a good seasoning takes time and proper use/care. To help with this process, we have great videos on how to season your carbon steel using your stovetop or oven, or check out our Seasoning Guide: https://madeincookware.com/blogs/seasoning-101-the-guide-to-seasoning-carbon-steel-cookware  With repeated seasoning or extended use, a slick seasoned coating called the patina will develop, which will help to prevent food from sticking. We recommend waiting to cook eggs and starchy foods on your carbon steel cookware until you have developed a thorough seasoning and a slick patina.

templates.name: Why is Fast Bar high in fat?

The low glycemic index of Fast Bar was independently tested and confirmed.

templates.name: How do I clean my Polished Perfection Brush?
templates.content:
The best way to clean your styling tool is with a lightly damp cloth, or to use alcohol wipes, in and between the bristles of your styling tool. Make sure to clean your tool when it is off, unplugged, and cool to the touch. It's important to ensure that product build-up does not occur on the bristles or body of the tool, especially if you're using thermally activated products like our Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Spray, our Thicc Volumizing Base, or our Vault Leave-in Cream.

Build-up of these products on the bristles of your styling tool causes heat to become trapped against them whenever you're using the tool and can cause the bristles to deteriorate.

templates.name: Why are my wicks smoking?
templates.content: Many factors can contribute to a wick smoking. The wax you are using, adding too much fragrance, adding too much dye, not trimming the wick, using a wick that is too large for the container it's in, or having the candle burning in a drafty place may cause it. Smoking can also tend to increase when the candle is starting to burn close to the bottom of a container because it's harder for oxygen to reach the flame.

templates.name: BRIGHTEYES Tingling/Burning Question
templates.content:
Please know that BRIGHTEYES™ has some powerful activities in it and tingling is just totally normal and should subside with regular use. This is the caffeine driving the peptides to stimulate your collagen. If you are starting to get redness or other visible skin irritation, you can reduce the usage to twice a week until your skin adjusts.

If you feel that your skin is actually having an allergic reaction, please trust your instincts and return the product back to us. We are more than happy to refund you because we just want you to love everything you're using!

templates.name: General: What is cellular transport technology or CTT?
templates.content: Cellular Transport Technology, or CTT, is the breakthrough delivery system, used in all of our products, designed to enhance rapid absorption of water and other key ingredients into the bloodstream. The water we consume is absorbed in the digestive system via passive transport (osmosis), whereas CTT utilizes an improved method via active transport (sodium-glucose transport). The precise ratio of sodium, glucose, and potassium creates an osmotic force that allows water to be delivered to the bloodstream earlier on in the digestive system.

templates.name: How do I clean my rug if staining occurs or if I feel it needs to be washed?
templates.content:
If a spill occurs, remove immediately by blotting with a clean, undyed cloth. Press firmly to absorb the spill. For a hard-to-remove stain, we recommend having it professionally cleaned by a rug cleaning service, not dry cleaner.
Avoid using any harsh chemicals as they can fade or damage your Rug.

templates.name: What do I do if I'm in-between sizes?
templates.content:
For our women's Classic Collection, we would recommend ordering down in size. These styles tend to run large, and the sheepskin suede does stretch with wear. For the Classic Collection, we would recommend ordering a full-size down if a whole size, or a half-size down if in between sizes.

However, our fashion boots and our rain and weather styles have a tendency to run more true to size and are often available in half sizes. For these styles, we would usually recommend ordering your regular size. Specific fit information may also be listed on the product page.

templates.name: My fragrance oil bottle is caved in some on the sides. What is wrong?
templates.content: There is nothing wrong with the fragrance when the sides of the bottle are caved in a little. This is called paneling, and it's a reaction that the plastic has with the fragrance oil that causes air to escape. We have our bottles specially treated to help prevent this, but unfortunately, it can still happen. The fragrances with a citrus smell are most likely to have this problem.

templates.name: What is a TSA lock?
templates.content: During the screening, TSA agents might need to unlock your luggage for more screening. To avoid delays, these locks were made specifically for the agents and only they have the master key to open these locks. There are many reasons as to why TSA agents might need to open a bag i.e.: faulty x-ray imaging, the suitcase is overweighed, or something in the luggage looks suspicious, however, after inspection TSA agents usually leave a "Notice of Baggage Inspection" inside the luggage and relock the luggage before clearing the luggage for travel.

This won't only reduce the chances of shrinking, but it's also environmentally friendly and will help to increase the longevity of your items!

templates.name: My patches are not sticking?/Adhesion complaints
templates.content: Sorry about the issue that you're having with your patches. It's important that you cleansed the skin very well (with an oil-free cleanser) prior to application as other products or natural oils might interfere with the adhesion. You can actually reactivate the adhesive on your patches by giving them a wash. We recommend using an oil-free cleanser and hot water. You always want to make sure it's completely dry before your next application or before placing it back on the storage shield. If after trying this the patches still don't stick and you placed your purchase in the last 30 days, please contact us directly at care@siobeauty.com with more details about your experience, e-mail address and order number and we'll be happy to find a solution for you.

templates.name: What is the average cost of buying an electric car?
templates.content: On average, the purchase price of an electric vehicle is still higher than a gasoline vehicle, but that price gap is closing. In September 2023, the average purchase price of an EV was less than $2,000 more than the overall industry average - and that difference is shrinking over time. However, while electric cars generally have higher suggested retail prices, they offer a lower cost of ownership, thanks to how much money you can save on fuel and maintenance. There are also many financial incentives available to buyers of electric vehicles. Federal, regional, and even local incentives can lower the total cost. The best-known incentive is from the federal government, with a tax credit of up to $7,500 available for certain models, if you meet certain conditions. Many states also offer EV incentives that can further reduce your cost.You can research available incentives using the GreenCars Incentive Tool. https://www.greencars.com/resources/ev-incentives

templates.name: Can I drink your products if I'm pregnant or breastfeeding?
templates.content: Our lattes contain adaptogenic herbs and mushrooms that, despite being used in many cultures for millennia, may or may not be safe for you while pregnant or breastfeeding-it depends on your body and your baby's body. There are currently no scientific studies that prove 100% safety, so we prefer to be cautious and advise to avoid adaptogens while pregnant or breastfeeding. Of course, we encourage you to also reach out to your health care provider, naturopath, or herbalist to get their feedback.

templates.name: I'm worried the Midnight Luxe might be too soft
templates.content: The Midnight Luxe is great for side sleepers. If you sleep more on your back or stomach and prefer a medium firm feel, we recommend the Dusk Luxe instead. If you prefer a firm feel, you can take a look at the Dawn Luxe.

templates.name: Is Màkku gluten free?
templates.content:
To provide an easy to drink, smooth Makgeolli that also provides nuanced depth, we use a blend of both wheat and rice based nuruk. Our resulting products all meet the threshold of being gluten free, as per the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. 

The threshold for being gluten-free as per the FDA is <20 ppm (parts per million) and our gluten level per can is <5 ppm.

templates.name: Tousled Waves, Loose & Undone Waves, Defined & Polished Curls - Can I use this product in all countries?
templates.content: Yes, this appliance contains a special electronic circuit that automatically converts it for worldwide usage - from 100-240 volts AC, 50/60Hz. Simply plug the tool into the local outlet and the tool will automatically adjust to the local current. However, you may need a plug adapter to fit into the power supply receptacle. Do not use this product with a converter.
